description: Lamai Coconut Resort offers standalone bungalow with private balconies, just steps from Lamai Beach. It boasts a sun terrace, a private beach area and free Wi-fi in the entire hotel. The resort is a stroll to Lamai’s shopping and nightlife options, while Hinta Hinyay is a 5-minute drive away. It takes 25 minutes by car from Lamai Coconut to Samui Airport. Bright and airy, all bungalows feature large windows and come with air conditioning, satellite TV and a fridge. They also have an en suite bathroom with hot and cold shower facilities. A safety deposit box is provided in all bungalows. For guests’ convenience, the resort provides a tour desk which organises excursions to local attractions. It also offers car and motorbike rental facilities. The all-day dining restaurant serves both Thai and Western dishes, which the bar provides refreshing beverages.

name: The samui beach resort
description: Located along the white and sandy Chaweng Beach, The Samui Beach Resort - SHA Plus Certified offers a relaxing getaway, just steps away from the beach. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. The contemporary-style rooms and villas are fully furnished and equipped with modern amenities to ensure a comfortable stay. Rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom fitted with shower facilities. Private balcony with sea views are also available for selected room types. The open-air restaurant and beachfront restaurant serves tasty Thai and international cuisines. Snacks and refreshing drinks are also available at the pool bar. At The Samui Beach Resort - SHA Plus Certified, guests can enjoy a sunny afternoon on the sun loungers or opt for a refreshing swim in the outdoor pool that overlooks the sea. Soothing massages can also be arranged for an additional charge. Services including airport transfers, ticketing services and shuttle services to the nearby landmarks can all be arranged on-site. The property is only 600 metres from Chaweng Walking Street as well as bars and restaurants. Central Festival Samui is located within a 10-minute drive. Samui Airport is approximately 5 km away.

name: Tropica - Villas Resort
description: No description found

name: Panorama Samui Residences
address: 79/7 Bang Por Soi 4 Moo 6 Maenam, Koh Samui 84330
description: When you stay at Panorama Samui Residences in Koh Samui, you'll be near the beach, within a 15-minute drive of Nathon Pier and Bo Phut Beach. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, multilingual staff, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: The Bay Samui
description: Unwind in tranquil surroundings and comfortable accommodation with traditional Thai hospitality at Arayaburi Boutique Resort located in Koh Samui. Just a short stroll away from the white sands and blue waters of Samrong Bay, villas are decorated in a contemporary style with a Thai touch. They are also equipped with all the amenities needed for a pleasant stay. Kick-back and relax by the large swimming pool, which also has a children's section. For those looking for adventure, enquire with the helpful staff at the tour desk for day trips and activities. You can take part in diving, sea kayaking and a whole host of other water sports available. Other facilities include a fitness centre and Thai traditional massage that will leave you feeling rejuvenated. Once you've worked up an appetite, head on over to the sea view restaurant or bakery for some local delights or sweet treats.

name: The Humble Villas
description: Set by Bang Makham Beach, The Humble Villas features a villa with private pools and sea views, non-smoking rooms, and free WiFi. Featuring ticket service, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. Guests can have a cocktail at the bar. At the resort, rooms are fitted with a balcony with a sea view. The Humble Villas features certain rooms that include pool views, and all rooms are fitted with a private bathroom and a desk. All units at the accommodation come with a seating area. Guests at The Humble Villas can enjoy a à la carte breakfast. Samui International Airport is 15 km from the property.

name: Idyllic Samui Beach Villa Resort
address: 6/16 Moo 5, Ban Plai Laem, T. Bophut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Idyllic Samui Beach Villa Resort at Samrong Bay is an ocean front resort, with direct access to the beach. Located on a peaceful area of Koh Samui, vibrant Chaweng Beach is accessible within a short 15-minute drive away with shuttle bus and taxi service provided by the property. Free WiFi is available. All villas have access to a private pool, and most villas have a children pool. All villas come with a private parking and tropical garden. Guests staying in the apartment and studio types can make use of a shared swimming pool. All room types come with an en suite kitchen, separate seating area and a dressing room. Cable TV, a DVD player and BBQ facilities are also available. Guests staying in the villas of Idyllic Samui Beach Villa Resort have access to barbecue facilities. Guests can request to have their massages in the villa or in front of the sea. Airport shuttle is provided. Idyllic Samui is 10 minutes by car from Fisherman Village where there are many restaurants and small shops. Samui Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Boujis Boutique Resort
address: 103 B Moo 3, Bophut Chaweng Noi, Koh Samui 84320
description: Set within the scenic parkland of Chaweng, Boujis Boutique Resort provides comfortable accommodation and a wide range of facilities, such as free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and an express check-in and check-out feature. It is a 10-minute drive from Chaweng Beach and offers free private parking on site. The resort has 16 rooms and has been recently refurbished. It also provides babysitting services, a currency exchange and a reception that is available around the clock. The rooms are air conditioned and include a refrigerator, an in-room dining area and slippers. Each have their very own sitting area and a range of entertainment options, including a flat-screen TV. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to have a meal. Samui International Airport is less than a 15-minute drive from Boujis Boutique Resort. Wat Phra Yai is within an easy car ride from the resort.Revato

name: Samui Pier Beach Front & Resort
description: Samui Pier Beach Front & Resort is just 2 minutes’ walk from Bangrak Beach. It features an outdoor pool and rooms with sea views. Wi-Fi is free in public areas. Offering views of Koh Phangan, the air-conditioned rooms have cable TV, a safety deposit box, and tea/coffee making facilities. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower. Samui Pier Beach Front & Resort is about 5 minutes’ drive from Samui International Airport and Big Buddha Temple. Koh Samui is an 80-minute flight from Bangkok’s Suvarnabhumi International Airport. Guests can have a relaxing massage, or enjoy water activities like diving and fishing. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can arrange tour bookings, shuttle services, and laundry. Car rentals and luggage storage are also available. Thai and European dishes are served at the restaurant.

name: Lipa Lodge Beach Resort
address: 75/4 Moo3, Lipa Noi, Koh Samui, Suratthani, Koh Samui 84140
description: The 4-star Lipa Lodge Resort offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Samui. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Daily housekeeping, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, airport transfer are just some of the facilities on offer. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. Take a break from a long day and make use of private beach, outdoor pool, massage, pool (kids), table tennis. Lipa Lodge Resort combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Samui unforgettable.priceline.com

name: Bo Phut Resort & Spa
address: 12/12 Moo 1, Tambol Bo Phut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Bo Phut Resort and Spa - SHA Plus is 8 minutes walk from the beach. Boasting Thai accommodation, Bo Phut Resort and Spa - SHA Plus offers outdoor pools and a golf course. Located on Bo Phut beach, the resort is about 1.5 km from the Fisherman's Village and 5 km from Samui International Airport. It offers airport transfers for convenience. All rooms and villas come with private balconies and windows with garden views. En suite bathrooms have separate shower and bathtub, while facilities like a satellite TV, DVDs and a CD player are provided for guests’ entertainment. Massages and other personalised spa treatments are also provided at Bo Phut Resort’s spa. Guests also have the luxury of a sauna and spa tub. Recreational activities include canoeing, and table tennis. Alternatively, there is a small library on site for a quiet day indoors. The restaurant offers local and international dishes. Cocktails and lights snacks are served by the pool or at the Beach Bar.

name: Prana Resort Nandana
description: Prana Resort Nandana boasts a stunning beachside infinity pool and a second pool surrounded by shaded palms with a swim-up bar. It also features the Tropikana Beach Club & Bistro, a poolside café, rooftop spa, fitness centre, 24-hour reception with concierge, and free WiFi for all guests. Stylish, spacious air-conditioned rooms have private balconies or terraces with seating. All are equipped with a 42-inch flat-screen TV, tea/coffee making facilities, hairdryers, and a safety deposit box. Suites include a separate living area with sea views, while some rooms feature direct pool access or their own plunge pool. Additional services include a kid's club, meeting facilities, and an outdoor spa bath. Free on-site parking is provided and a shuttle can take guests to the city centre or Fisherman's Village. Prana Resorts Samui (SHA Certified) is a 10-minute drive from Samui Airport and a 3-minute drive from both Fisherman's Village and the Big Buddha. Chaweng Beach and Central Festival Samui are also a short drive away. Koh Phangan, with its monthly full moon party, is just 30 minutes by ferry from the nearby port. From personal beach bags and delicious candy treats to super comfy beds and fresh flowers, it’s the little touches that make a difference at Prana. Perfect for couples, singles, groups, and families — rated 8.5 for a two-person trip.

name: Explorar Koh Samui - Adults Only Resort and Spa
description: Set in a prime location of Samui, Sensimar Koh Samui puts everything the city has to offer just outside your doorstep. The hotel offers a high standard of service and amenities to suit the individual needs of all travelers. All the necessary facilities, including free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, fireplace, infirmary, are at hand. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, fireplace, free welcome drink. Recuperate from a full day of sightseeing in the comfort of your room or take advantage of the hotel's recreational facilities, including snorkeling, private beach, fitness center, outdoor pool, water sports (non-motorized). For reliable service and professional staff, Sensimar Koh Samui caters to your needs.priceline.com

name: Sarocha Villa
description: Sarocha Villa is located along Lamai Beach and less than a 10-minute walk from Grandmother and Grandfather Rock. Boasting dreamy tropical views, rooms come with private balconies and free Wi-Fi. The Sarocha Villa is a 30-minute drive from Koh Samui Airport and the Seatran Ferry Pier. Guests can make use of the airport shuttle service or the car rental facilities. Nestled within tropical gardens, rooms are bright and airy, offering great views of the ocean. They are air-conditioned and come with cable TV, a minibar and private bathroom facilities. To make the most of Samui’s beautiful lagoons, the property provides kayaks for free. It also has a tour desk which helps guests organise excursions and trekking trips. The property’s restaurant provides an American, Continental or Asian breakfast.

name: Baan Hin Sai Resort & Spa
description: Nestled on the hillside overlooking the stunning sea, this luxurious resort brings you a deep sense of relaxation with its tranquil surroundings and fine facilities. Free WiFi is available at the lobby. Located between Chaweng and Lamai beach, Baan Hin Sai Resort & Spa enjoys easy access to the best sunbathing spots on Koh Samui. Blending in with the beautiful nature surrounding it, the resort is elegant yet casual at the same time, offering classy comfort that can be enjoyed by families too. Enjoy the sea breeze in our lobby or pool bar while enjoying a cool drink, or let us pamper you with a host of impressive spa treatments. At the end of the day, why not head to our restaurant and indulge in delicious Thai and international favourites before returning to your room. Furnished with a local touch, the peaceful rooms enjoy views of nature and come with furniture made of teakwood, ideal for rest and relaxation.

name: At Samui Haus
description: Located in Lipa Noi, @Samui Haus is a beach front accommodation boasting an outdoor pool, a terrace and free bikes. Free WiFi access is available throughout the area. It is 1.1 km from Niki Beach Samui and 1.4 km from Racha Ferry Pier. Each air-conditioned unit comes with a cable TV, a safety deposit box and a seating area. Complete with an electric kettle, the dining area also has a refrigerator and a minibar. En suite bathroom is equipped with shower facilities, bathrobes and free toiletries. A bath tub is available in some units. For convenience, @Samui Haus can arrange ticketing, car hire and shuttle services. Other facilities include barbeque facilities, room service and massage. For outdoor enthusiasts, snorkeling, canoeing and cycling are available in the surroundings. This resort is 27 km from Chaweng Beach. Samui Airport is 30 km away. Guests can sample Thai and international cuisines at the on-site restaurant or enjoy special drinks and cocktails at the bar.

name: Kirati Beach Resort
address: 24/85 Moo 5 Tambol Bophut, Koh Samui District, Suratthani, Koh Samui 84320
description: Kirati Beach Resort is situated in the centre of Chengmon Beach, a 5-minute drive from Chaweng Beach and a 15-minute drive from Maenam beach. It offers massage services, a tour desk, and a 24-hour reception. Throughout the stay, guests can enjoy free WiFi. Surrounded by greenery, each air-conditioned room at Kirati Beach Resort comes with a private balcony. Room amenities include a TV, a fridge, and a safety deposit box. Kirati Beach Resort offers laundry services and car rental. Guests can enjoy quiet moments in the garden or on the terrace. The seaside restaurant serves fresh seafood dishes as well as Thai and international specialties. Alternatively, a range of dining outlets can be found within a 5-minute drive from this property. Kirati Beach Resort is a 10-minute drive from Samui Airport. Transfers can be arranged.

name: The Florist Resort
description: The Florist Resort offers modern Thai accommodation with free Wi-Fi along Mae Nam Beach in Koh Samui. Surrounded by tropical greenery, it has 3 outdoor pools for guest to choose from. Fully air-conditioned, rooms are fitted with tiled flooring and wooden furnishings. Each is equipped with a cable TV and hairdryer. Views of the pool can be enjoyed from the private balconies of most rooms. Free 2 bottles of water are provided. The Florist Resort is a 25-minute drive from Samui International Airport and Chaweng Beach. It is a 15-minute drive from delicious seafood at Fisherman Village, as well as Big C Super Store. Guests can rent a speedboat to visit the nearby islands, or enjoy the sun loungers by the 25-metre outdoor pool. The resort also provides a tour desk and laundry services. Old Samui Restaurant serves a daily buffet breakfast, as well as barbecued seafood dinners on Tuesdays and Fridays. Live music and drinks can also be enjoyed there.

name: Samui Blue Orchid - Adult Only
description: Just a short distance from the sea, this welcoming villa lets you experience it all. There's convenient uncovered onsite parking, so you can leave your vehicle behind and let your feet make short work of the 11-minute walk to Choeng Mon Beach or the 6-minute walk to Mini Golf International. Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the private pool (enjoy the sun loungers!), or sip a drink in the garden of this villa, which also features a picnic area. For a change of scenery, come inside and enjoy the free WiFi and TV. This 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom rental features a living room, a dining area, a BBQ grill, and luggage storage. Bathroom amenities include free toiletries, bathrobes, and towels. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchen, complete with a stovetop and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. And there's access to laundry facilities, so you can even pack a bit lighter.Expedia

name: Bay Beach Resort
address: 24/3 Moo 5 Choeng Mon Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Comfortable and laidback, the hotel features modern facilities and warm, traditional hospitality on the white and sandy Cheong Mon Beach of Ko Samui. The peaceful and unspoiled Choeng Mon Beach is located on the northeast corner of Ko Samui, an ideal spot for guests seeking a quiet and relaxing holiday by the sea. It is only a short ride to Ko Samui’s most important places, such as the shopping and nightlife area. Take a swim in the cool waters of our swimming pool or quietly read a book in our beautiful tropical gardens. The hotel also comes with fine restaurants offering you international and local cuisine.

name: Bangpo Village
description: Enjoying a beachfront location on Bangpo Beach, this hotel offers simple bungalows featuring wood flooring, private balconies and tropical views. Bangpo Village also features a tour desk and massage services. Free WiFi is available in all rooms. It takes only 10 minutes by car from the hotel to Santiburi Golf course. The Bangpo Village provides a shuttle service to Samui Airport, located a 25-minute drive away. Bungalows offer spacious and well-appointed interiors with a kitchenette, seating area and an en suite bathroom. They are fitted with a minibar, air conditioning and feature a work area in all private balconies. For leisure, guests can visit Chaweng’s famous nightlife spots, located a 25-minute drive from the hotel. Car and motorbike rental facilities are available at the hotel. Room service is provided for convenience. Alternatively, guests can make use of the hotel’s barbecue facilities.

name: Top Hostel Samui
address: 17/60 Moo 3 Chaweng Beach Rd, Koh Samui 84140
description: Top Hostel Samui is located in Chaweng, 60 metres from Chaweng Beach and 600 metres from Chaweng Noi Beach. Featuring a garden, the 3-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation provides room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests. Each room comes with a safety deposit box, while selected rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also offer city views. Guest rooms at the hotel are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Fisherman Village is 6.7 km from Top Hostel Samui, while Big Buddha is 7.8 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 3 km from the accommodation.

name: First Bungalow Beach Resort
description: Located within the scenic countryside of Chaweng, First Bungalow Beach Resort Koh Samui provides modern accommodation and a full range of facilities, including a coffee bar, free Wi-Fi and a playground. It offers 3-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. First Beach Bungalow has a gym with a swimming pool. Additionally, the multilingual staff are available to provide local information. Rooms at First Bungalow offer a stylish space to relax, complete with a flat-screen TV and a mini bar. All provide a desk, an in-room closet and bottled water. First Bungalow Beach Resort houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests are able to relax of an evening. For those preferring to dine out, the local neighbourhood provides a number of bars and restaurants with a selection of varied cuisines. First Bungalow Beach Resort Samui is within walking distance of Chaweng Noi Beach. It is also a short car ride from Bo Phut and Maret.Revato

name: Conrad Koh Samui Residences
description: Conrad Koh Samui Residences are situated within Conrad Koh Samui Resort & Spa on Thailand's third largest island, Koh Samui, surrounded by the azure waters of the Gulf of Thailand. The idyllic luxury resort island is highly accessible from key gateway cities in Southeast Asia and only a 60-minute flight from Bangkok. Located on the south-western tip of the island, the residences showcase dazzling sunset views from all 15 of its two- and three-bedroom Oceanview Pool Villas. These deluxe villas are set over two levels. Separate living and dining rooms with kitchenette are located on the upper level, and bedrooms, private pool and outdoor deck are on the lower level. The villas are perfect for families and friends who wish to share the ultimate vacation experience. The 25-acre property consists entirely of beautifully decorated, free-standing contemporary Thai-style villas built along the rocky peninsula to ensure the greatest level of privacy and unobstructed ocean views. Conrad's array of world-class facilities cater to every need - from incredible culinary delights at three restaurants, two lounges and bar, private wine cellar and in-villa dining experience to beach-side activities and water sports – and enable guests to keep to their routines, discover new experiences, or just relax at the award-winning spa. Young families will be delighted with the large, infinity-edge main pool with an ocean view, and the Kid's Club, which also offers babysitting services and fun activities. Guests will find basic items at the resort shop. For those who wish to shop for local goods, the DoiTung Lifestyle Shop sells Thai handicrafts and momentos made by hilltribe people in the north of Thailand. Conrad Koh Samui Residences is an ideal choice for conferences, intimate meetings and celebrations. From spectacular gala events to informal celebrations or a private beachfront wedding, the resort offers a unique variety of indoor and outdoor locations to create the wedding of your dreams.Hilton

name: Adarin Beach Resort
description: Standing along the shores of Koh Samui, Adarin Beach Resort enjoys scenic views of Koh Phangan and offers guests spacious suites and villas. Adarin Beach Resort is located on Koh Samui’s Mae Nam Beach, a stretch of unspoiled white, sandy beach that is almost six kilometres long. The crystal clear water next to Adarin Beach Resort is perfect for snorkelling, diving and fishing. A cool breeze can be enjoyed on the beach all day long. Decorated with Thai-style furnishings, each suite and villa is spacious, bright and airy. Some villas are located on the beachfront, with the sea right at their doorsteps. Other suites and villas are set in a rich, tropical garden, offering you a natural and peaceful setting. From Thai dishes and seafood specialities to Mediterranean and European creations, Adarin Beach Resort’s restaurant offers a wide range cuisine. Dine on the beach under the blue sky or enjoy a romantic candlelight dinner under the stars.

name: Ptk Beach
address: 167/1 Moo 2, Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui, Surat Thani, Koh Samui 84320
description: Situated in Chaweng, 300 metres from Chaweng Beach, PTK BEACH features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a private beach area. The hotel has a hot tub, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property. All guest rooms in the hotel are equipped with a kettle. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, the rooms at PTK BEACH have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms include a balcony. At the accommodation rooms come with bed linen and towels. Chaweng Noi Beach is 2.6 km from PTK BEACH, while Big Buddha is 5.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International, 1 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Sunrise Bungalow
description: Sunrise Bungalow is located in southern Lamai, a 2-minute walk from the famous Hinta Hinyai (Grandfather Grandmother) Rocks. It offers a fitness room and a restaurant. Free parking is available. Rustic bungalows come with either a fan or air conditioning. All are equipped with a cable TV, minibar and sofa. En suite bathrooms come with hot-water showers and toiletries. Sunrise Bungalow is a 40-minute drive from Hin Lad Waterfall and Samui Airport. Car and motorbike rentals are available at an extra charge. PADI-certified diving courses and snorkelling equipment rentals are available. The resort also provides a tour desk. The on-site restaurant serves a selection of Thai and Western dishes. Guests can also enjoy French wine after meals.

name: Kirikayan Boutique Resort
description: Situated in the countryside, Kirikayan Boutique Resort is just a short drive from Samui Crocodile Farm. Featuring beach views, 4-star rooms and a private beach, it provides a superb setting for a luxurious retreat. Kirikayan Boutique Resort provides a wide range of state-of-the-art amenities, including free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. It provides babysitting services, a currency exchange and a reception that operates 24/7. This hotel provides rooms with an en suite bathroom, air conditioning and a TV. They all include an in-room safe, slippers and a seating area. Those staying at Kirikayan can dine on local and international cuisines at the in-house restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. Breakfast is available each morning and can be enjoyed in the comfort of the rooms. A variety of dining options can also be found nearby. Samui International Airport is a 10-minute drive from Kirikayan Boutique Resort Koh Samui. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Chaweng.Revato

name: Banana Fan Sea Resort
address: 201 Moo 2, Chaweng Beach Road, Koh Samui 84320
description: Banana Fan Sea Resort is located on the tranquil southern tip of Chaweng Beach, within a stroll of its entertainment and shopping spots. The resort provides well-appointed rooms, an outdoor pool with hot tub and free Wi-Fi. Each air-conditioned room comes with satellite TV, a mini bar and coffee/tea making facilities. They have an en suite bathroom, large mirrors and toiletries. Guests can enjoy a traditional Thai massage outdoors, by the pool and on the beach, or in the comfort of their rooms. For an exciting day outdoors, visit the many sports centre offering diving and boating trips, located along the beach. Banana Fan’s beachfront Baitong Restaurant offers an open-air dining concept and serves both local and international dishes. Room service is available. Banana Fan Sea Resort is a 15-minute drive from Samui Airport. Bo Phut Pier is about 5 km from the resort.

name: Sea Dance Resort
description: Sea Dance Resort is a 10-minute drive from Chaweng Beach. It offers cottages and villas with free Wi-Fi. The resort is equipped with a pool and free public parking. Staff at the front desk can assist guests with shuttle and laundry services. The resort is a 15-minute drive to Big Buddha. It is 5.5 km from Fisherman’s Village and 5.3 km from Bo Phut Pier. This resort is 3 km from Samui Airport. Rooms are equipped with a terrace and air conditioning. All rooms will provide guests with a fridge. Guests can enjoy Thai and European cuisines at the on-site restaurant between 07:00-23:00 hrs.

name: The Sarann
address: 95-96 Moo 3, Chaweng Noi Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Nestled on the tip of Koh Samuis pristine Chaweng Noi beach, The Sarann is an intimate oceanfront villa resort offering a distinctive level of relaxation and luxury. The name 'The Sarann' refers to a state of mind where all worries drift away and one's spirit is at peace. A stones throw from Koh Samuis main dining and nightlife area, and just 20 minutes from the airport, the resort offers a beautiful balance between quiet and convenience.iHotelier/iStay

name: Fair House Villas & Spa
description: A tropical and relaxing getaway along Mae Nam Beach can be enjoyed at Fair House Villas & Spa, Koh Samui. Aside from a private beach, it has an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi throughout the property. A chargeable airport shuttle is also available upon request. Fair House Villas & Spa is 10 km from Koh Samui’s city centre and Chaweng Beach. Samui Airport is 15 km from the resort. Spacious and elegant, rooms feature classic wooden furnishings and floor-to-ceiling windows which let in natural light. A cable TV and minibar are included in all rooms. Some come with ocean views. Lazy afternoons can be spent at Pandanus Spa with its relaxing massage therapies. With panoramic views of the ocean, the fitness centre provides a refreshing setting to exercise. Delicious Thai and European dishes are served at the resort’s restaurant. Every night, a special barbecue dinner with fresh seafood is available.

name: Baan Fah Resort
description: Located along the shores of Mae Name Beach, Baan Fah Resort features beachfront rooms with free Wi-Fi and an outdoor swimming pool. Baan Fah is in close proximity to Lomprayah Pier, where ferries to Phangan and Koh Tao can be accessed. The resort is a 18-minute drive from Chaweng Beach and Samui’s city centre. Samui International Airport is a 20-minute drive away. Baan Fah’s pleasant rooms are air conditioned and come equipped with cable TV channels. A minibar is provided in each room. Beachfront rooms overlook the ocean and the neighbouring island of Koh Phangan. Guests can relax and wind down with a tanning session at the resort’s sun terrace, or rent a car to explore the area. A tour desk assists in sightseeing arrangements. Baan Fah Resort’s restaurant serves a wide variety of local and western dishes.

name: Weekender Resort
description: Be warmly welcomed by the friendly staff and stunning views of Weekender Resort, which offers comfortably furnished rooms and easy access to the entertainment. The resort is located in the centre of the Lamai Beach area. It is 15 km from Samui Airport. Equipped with all the necessary amenities, rooms are furnished with air conditioning, en-suite bathroom with shower and bathtub, as well as free bottled water daily. Soak up the sun while lounging around the swimming pool, or enjoy the view of the sea while taking a refreshing dip. To soothe your muscles, indulge in a traditional Thai massage while the calming sea breeze relaxes you. After working up an appetite, head over to Weekender Resort's stylish on-site restaurant. Overlooking the beach, it serves fresh seafood, as well as a delicious selection of Thai and Western food.

name: Punnpreeda Beach Resort
address: 32 Moo 4, Bang Rak Beach, Koh Samui 84320
description: Located within a short walk of Bang Rak Beach, this 3-star unique hotel features a private beach. It also offers a free shuttle service, an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. Punnpreeda Beach Resort provides a garden to unwind in, as well as free private parking on site. Convenient services include an express check-in feature and a luggage storage area. The rooms are air conditioned and include a private balcony, a mini bar and a coffee maker. They all have movies-on-demand, a seating area and bottled water. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to have a meal. There is also a variety of breakfast options available every day. Punnpreeda Beach Resort is located under a 10-minute drive from Samui International Airport. Guests will find plenty to see and do in the local area, with Chaweng Beach a brief car ride away.Revato

name: Homm Chura Samui
description: Featuring a beach area, Chura Samui boasts relaxing massage treatments and a white marble infinity pool overlooking Chaweng Beach. This hotel offers free WiFi in all areas. Decorated in earth tones, the contemporary air-conditioned rooms overlook the tropical garden and feature a lounge area. A flat-screen TV and DVD player are provided. Private bathrooms feature double sinks. Chura Samui is a 5-minute drive from bars and restaurants and a 10-minute drive from Samui International Airport. For meals, fresh seafood awaits guests at this property. Alternatively, sip on a cocktail whilst enjoying views and refreshing sea breeze at the bar. Guests can have breakfast, prepared to order, and served at KAN Restaurant. Guests may exercise in the gym or make travel arrangements at the tour desk.

name: The Lamai Samui
description: The Lamai Samui is situated on Koh Samui, and provides 5-star accommodation as well as a private beach. Boasting views of Gulf of Thailand (Thailand), it also offers a wide range of facilities, including complimentary Wi-Fi, private parking and an outdoor pool. This luxury hotel provides a gym, a concierge and a 24-hour reception. Forming part of the hotel are the beautifully manicured grounds, designed for taking a relaxing walk. The rooms at The Lamai Samui are air-conditioned and offer slippers, a refrigerator and a mini bar. They come with bottled water, an in-room safe and tea and coffee making facilities. The Lamai Samui provides a variety of places to have a meal, including The Plate and The Lounge. There is a range of breakfast options on offer every morning. The hotel is an ideal place to discover nearby Koh Taen and Chaweng Noi Beach, as well as everything the local area has to offer. Chaweng and Bo Phut are also a brief car ride from the property.Revato

name: Samui Little Garden Resort
address: 166/107 Moo 2, Bo Phut, Chaweng, Koh Samui 84320
description: Set in Chaweng, 500 metres from Chaweng Beach, Samui Little Garden Resort offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. 4.6 km from Big Buddha and 6.8 km from Fisherman Village, the property provides a terrace and a bar. The resort also features free WiFi as well as a paid airport shuttle service. Some rooms come with a kitchenette with a fridge, a minibar and a stovetop. Guests at the resort can enjoy a continental breakfast. Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks is 14 km from Samui Little Garden Resort, while Chaweng Viewpoint is 6.5 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 3 km from the accommodation.

name: Celes Samui
description: Admirably located right next to the beach, Celes BeachFront Resort - Koh Samui offers stylish accommodation. The resort building is designed to allow natural light in the lobby area. The outdoor pool directly faces a panoramic view of the sea and has comfortable relaxing areas and shades. Guests can enjoy drinks at the poolside bar. Free WiFi is available throughout the property and free private parking is offered on site. With a private balcony overlooking the refreshing views, all spacious rooms at this property feature an air conditioning and wooden floor. Each room provides a seating area for guests to relax in and a flat-screen TV to enjoy. Extras include an electric kettle, complimentary coffee/tea and bottles of water. The en suite bathroom comes with a shower and premium amenities. Guests can indulge in pampering spa treatments or work out at the fitness centre. Staff are 24-hour available at the front desk. Surcharged airport shuttle service can be arranged upon request. Fisherman Village is 2.2 km from the property, while Bo Phut Pier is 2.5 km away. The nearest airport is Samui Airport, 8 km from Celes BeachFront Resort - Koh Samui.

name: Cielo Boutique Hotel & Spa Samui
address: 180/5 Moo1, Koh Samui, Suratthani, Koh Samui 84320
description: Located right on Bophut Beach, Cielo Boutique Hotel & Spa Samui - SHA Extra Plus is a 5-minute drive from Fisherman’s Village. It offers non-smoking modern suites and villas with private terraces and pools and free Wi-Fi. The property features a pool, tour desk and massage service. Free public parking is possible on site. We also have a brand new beach restaurant proposing Mediterranean & Asian organic homemade food. You'll also enjoy a brand new yoga hub. The property is a 15-minute drive from Chaweng Centre and Samui Airport. It is a 30-minute drive to Lamai Beach. Suites are fitted with a minibar and safety deposit box. Free toiletries and shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. For guests’ convenience, the property provides car rental and shuttle services. Laundry and daily maid service are available. Koh-Co Beach is a 100% Seafood restaurant supplied by local producers. Our menu offers a mix between Asian & Mediterranean flavors. Payments by Credit Cards are subjected to a 3% fee.

name: Anahata Resort
description: Anahata Resort is located on Lipa Noi Beach on the western coast of Koh Samui. This Eco-friendly, traditional Thai tropical beachfront hideaway boasts 2 accommodation areas, connected by a beach front path. All guests rooms are air-conditioned and include a tea/coffee maker. Free drinking water is available throughout your stay when you purchase the Trash Hero bottle or if you have your own recyclable bottle. Guests staying at Anahata Resort can enjoy traditional Thai massages and spa treatments at a pavilion by the beach or in the indoor treatment rooms, with experienced therapists and products that are chemical free. You can watch the the sunset, at the beachfront restaurant, Alchemy Cafe and Juice Bar, which offers an extensive selection of raw, vegan, vegetarian and healthy Flexitarian Thai and fusion foods. The property selects local, natural and organic ingredients to create delicious and nutritious dishes. Many of the ingredients used are grown in the properties garden. The helpful staff can also provide assistance in motorbike and car rentals. For those looking for more activities, the on-site tour desk can arrange day trips and other activities. Yoga classes and group activities on site are available at an additional charge. Anahata Resort is just steps away from Niki Beach Samui. The resort is a short 10-minute drive from Lipa Noi Pier and a 15-minute ride from Nathon Town. Samui Airport is approximately 29 km away.

name: Sea Valley Resort
address: 123/3 Moo 2 Lipa Noi, Koh Samui, Suratthani, Koh Samui 84140
description: Overlooking the sandy shores of Lipa Noi Beach, Sea Valley Resort offer private air-conditioned villas and most with a private pool. Apart from its sea-front outdoor pool, the hotel also provides pampering spa services. Hiding behind landscaped gardens, villas feature a private terrace which enjoys beautiful sunset views. Fitted with wooden flooring and free Wi-Fi, Free Netflix in all the rooms, DVD player and a lounge area. En suite bathrooms come with glass roofs and hot-water showers. Located opposite popular Chaweng Beach, Hotel Sea Valley & Spa is a 5-minute drive from the white sands of Nathon Beach and a 45-minute drive from Samui Airport. Staff at the tour desk can help arrange trekking and diving trips, where guests can explore the natural beauty of Koh Samui. Alternatively, traditional Thai massages can be enjoyed at the spa. Overlooking the beach, Sea Valley’s restaurant offers an intimate dining experience at its outdoor seating area. After meals, relax with a cocktail and sports programmes at the bar.

name: Zazen Boutique Resort & Spa
description: The award-winning Zazen Boutique Resort & Spa, which means "finding inner peace" in Japanese, is located on a private beachfront on Bo Phut Beach. This peaceful sanctuary features an outdoor pool, free Wi-Fi and 3 dining options. The luxurious non-smoking bungalows and villas feature modern Thai decor, high ceilings and large living spaces. All are equipped with a flat-screen TV, DVD player and an open-air bathroom with a rainshower. Zazen Boutique Resort & Spa is about a 15-minute walk from Fisherman Village. The resort provides free parking and is a 10-minute drive from the Big Buddha Temple. Guests can relax with a massage at the garden spa, take a yoga class or go windsurfing. A hot tub and water sports facilities are also available. Travel and sightseeing arrangements can be made at the tour desk. Thai and international dishes can be enjoyed at the beachfront Zazen Restaurant. Refreshing cocktails are offered at Rouge Lounge, while Le Salon de Ti serves high tea.

name: C.Samui Guesthouse
description: No description found

name: Am Samui Resort Taling Ngam
address: 39 Moo 3, Tambon Taling Ngam, Koh Samui 84140
description: This tropical Thai-style beach resort features an outdoor pool and a private beach. It offers a range of bungalows with free Wi-Fi and beautiful views of the garden or sea. Relaxing Thai massage is also available. Fully air-conditioned, bungalows at Am Samui Resort all come with a satellite TV, minibar and personal safe. A private balcony and private bathroom are provided. Am Samui Resort is a 45-minute drive from Chaweng Beach. Transfers to the airport are available at an extra charge. Guests can arrange day trips at the tour desk, or request for room service. The resort also provides laundry and ironing services. Thai cuisine and fresh seafood are served at the resort's restaurant. Refreshing cocktails accompanied by colourful sunset views can be enjoyed at the bar.

name: Pawpaw Resort
description: Located in Koh Samui, 300 metres from Laem Set Beach, PawPaw Resort provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Providing a bar, the property is located within 400 metres of Natien Beach. The accommodation offers a concierge service, and organising tours for guests. At the resort, every room is fitted with a balcony. With a private bathroom equipped with a shower and free toiletries, rooms at PawPaw Resort also offer free WiFi, while certain rooms include a sea view. At the accommodation each room comes with bed linen and towels. An à la carte, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast is available daily at the property. At PawPaw Resort you will find a restaurant serving British, Thai and local cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Bang Kao Beach is 2.9 km from the resort, while Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks is 5.3 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International, 19 km from PawPaw Resort, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Cinnamon Beach Villas
description: Cinnamon Beach Villas provides stylish beach-front accommodation on Lamai Beach, 30 minutes from Koh Samui Airport. The resort features an extensive outdoor pool and traditional Thai massage facilities. The spacious guestrooms of the Cinnamon Beach are generously appointed combining local features with modern amenities. They offer balconies with sea views and living areas equipped with satellite flat-screen TV, CD and DVD player. The private bathrooms include a shower and slippers. Guests can enjoy ‘al fresco’ dining at the restaurant of the resort. An assortment of Thai specialties and international cuisine are served on a deck, offering sea views. Facilities of the Cinnamon Beach Villas include free wired internet and free private parking. There is a tour desk to assist in uncovering Koh Samui attractions, including Lipa Noi Beach and the other islands of the Ang Thong Marine National Park.

name: The Beach Samui
address: 30/23 Moo 5, Thong Krut Village, Koh Samui 84140
description: Ideally located in the Taling Ngam area, The Beach Samui promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The property offers guests a range of services and amenities designed to provide comfort and convenience. To be found at the property are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour security, daily housekeeping, 24-hour front desk, express check-in/check-out. Comfortable guestrooms ensure a good night's sleep with some rooms featuring facilities such as flat screen television, clothes rack, complimentary instant coffee, free welcome drink, linens. Entertain yourself with the property's recreational facilities, including outdoor pool, massage. Convenience and comfort make The Beach Samui the perfect choice for your stay in Samui.priceline.com

name: Chaweng Lakeview Residence
description: A 5-minute drive from Chaweng Centre, Chaweng Lakeview Residence offers modern villas with a kitchen and a private balcony as well as a shared swimming pool. It is a 10-minute drive from Samui Airport and has free Wi-Fi. Furnished with simple yet stylish decor, each villa comes with a flat-screen cable TV with streaming services, a DVD player and a safety deposit box. Free toiletries are included in a bathroom. Shuttle service can be arranged for guests, as well as car and motorbike rental services. Daily cleaning services are provided. For convenience, Chaweng Lakeview Residence provides a variety of services including laundry, luggage storage and private chef. Free private parking is possible on site. Within 100 metres, guests will find a nearby restaurant and bar.

name: Nikki Beach Resort & Spa
description: Steps from Lipa Noi’s beautiful sunset coast, the luxurious Nikki Beach Resort & Spa offers relaxing stays with an exclusive beachfront and modern bungalows. This chic boutique resort features a beachfront pool, fitness facilities and soothing massages. A short drive from various attractions, Nikki Beach Resort & Spa is 15 km from Nathon Pier and 10 km from beautiful Namuang Waterfall. It offers free parking and is a 45-minute drive from Samui Airport. Featuring tasteful dark wood furnishings, bungalows open out to sweeping views of Thailand’s Gulf or tropical greenery. They have a 42-inch flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. Lazy afternoons can be spent on day beds by the landscaped pool or with a soothing massage in the outdoor pavilion. Staff are on hand to help coordinate daily activities and tours. The spa centre offers a copious variety of treatments ranging from body massages, scrubs, facials and steam room sessions. Tropical garden views accompany seafood, Thai and international specialities at Nikki’s restaurant. After-meal drinks and signature cocktails can be enjoyed at the bar, which features a DJ and Nikki Beach’s signature brand of music and entertainment.

name: Villa Sasipimon - Panoramic Duplex Studio
address: 82/49 Moo 3 Bophut Koh Samui, Koh Samui 84320
description: Villa Sasipimon - Panoramic Duplex Studio features free WiFi throughout the property and views of sea in Chaweng Noi Beach. Each accommodation at the 5-star hotel has city views, and guests can enjoy access to a hot tub. There is free private parking and the property offers free airport shuttle service. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. At Villa Sasipimon - Panoramic Duplex Studio all rooms come with bed linen and towels. A continental, Asian or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Chaweng Noi Beach is 1 km from the accommodation, while Coral Cove Beach is 2.4 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 6 km from Villa Sasipimon - Panoramic Duplex Studio.

name: Papillon Resort
address: 159/3 Moo 2, T. Bophut, Chaweng Beach, Koh Samui 84302
description: Overlooking Chaweng Beach, Papillon Resort offers comfortable accommodation in Ko Samui. It has an outdoor swimming pool and free private parking. All rooms boast a private outdoor terrace. Featuring local Thai decor, Papillon’s rooms provide en suite bathrooms, air conditioning and cable TVs. Le Café des Arts is Resort Papillon’s all-day restaurant and bar. It serves a wide range of food including Thai, French and Asian cuisines. The resort is 15 minutes’ drive from Samui Airport. Within 5 minutes’ drive of the hotel, guests can find the lively Chaweng nightlife, local shops, restaurants and cafes.

name: Riviera Beach Hotel
description: Facing the beachfront, Riviera Beach Hotel offers 3-star accommodation in Bophut and has a terrace, restaurant and bar. Boasting a private beach area, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around a few steps from Bophut Beach, 1.1 km from Bang Rak Beach and 300 metres from Fisherman Village. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and free toiletries, all rooms at Riviera Beach Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms also boast a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at Riviera Beach Hotel can enjoy a continental breakfast. Big Buddha is 4.5 km from the hotel, while Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks is 16 km from the property. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 3 km from Riviera Beach Hotel.

name: Hansar Samui Resort & Spa
description: Located on Bophut Beach, Hansar Samui features sea view rooms. Less than 500 metres away from Fisherman’s Village, it also offers dining outlets, a fitness centre and an infinity pool. The resort’s spacious rooms feature handmade furniture, wooden floors and stone basins. Each room has a living area with a daybed. Modern amenities include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and free WiFi access. Hansar Samui’s H-Bistro serves local and Western dishes and seafood. To sip drinks with views of the sea, guests can head to the resort’s Pool and Beach Bar or the Chill Lounge. Guests of Hansar Samui can work out at the fitness centre or enjoy body treatments at the spa. A tour desk can assist with travel and sightseeing arrangements. Hansar Samui Resort & Spa is a 10-minute drive from Koh Samui Airport.

name: Paradise Island Estate
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a soaking tub and a rainfall showerhead, as well as a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop. Other amenities include Frette Italian sheets, premium bedding, a Select Comfort bed, and down comforters.Expedia

name: The Privilege Hotel Ezra Beach Club
description: Located in Bangrak Beach, 1.7 km from Big Buddha, The Privilege Hotel Ezra Beach Club features an outdoor pool and sun terrace. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. The popular Fisherman's Village is a 5-minute drive away. All fully furnished rooms are fitted with a flat-screen TV. Some units include a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Views of the sea, pool or garden are featured in certain rooms. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. This hotel has a secluded beach area and car hire is available. A range of activities are offered in the area, such as snorkelling and diving. The Chaweng Beach area is a 15-minute drive away, while Samui Airport is is a 10-minute drive from the property.

name: Skye Beach Hotel
address: 8/135 Plai Laem Soi 5 M.5, Bophut, Koh Samui, Koh Samui 84320
description: No description found

name: Marine Chaweng Beach Resort
description: Marine Chaweng Beach Resort is conveniently located in the popular Chaweng area. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Marine Chaweng Beach Resort. Television LCD/plasma screen, mirror, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms can be found in selected guestrooms. Entertain the hotel's recreational facilities, including diving, fishing, massage, water sports (motorized). A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Marine Chaweng Beach Resort.Agoda

name: New Star Beach Resort
description: Situated on Chaweng Beach in Koh Samui, New Star Beach Resort offers luxurious beachfront accommodation. It features an infinity-edge pool and 2 dining options. Free parking is provided. Rooms and villas are decorated in a tropical style with wooden furnishings. Each room has a private balcony, TV and minibar. Treat yourself to a massage at Akiira Spa, or go on a dive trip or an elephant trek. Other facilities include laundry service and car rental. Breakfast buffet is served at Lime Restaurant, which offers indoor and al fresco seating. Sip afternoon tea at the Lobby Lounge or arrange for a meal by the pool. New Star Beach Resort is a 15-minute drive from Samui Airport.

name: Thai Fight Hotel
address: 26/1-3 moo3 Tambol Maret Lamai Beach, Koh samui, Koh Samui 84310
description: Situated in Lamai, 200 metres from Rocky's Beach, Thai Fight Hotel features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Boasting room service, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and a terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared lounge and free WiFi. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Thai Fight Hotel the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an Asian breakfast. Thai Fight Hotel offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Lamai Beach, Grandfather's Grandmother's Rocks and Lamai Viewpoint. The nearest airport is Samui International Airport, 14 km from Thai Fight Hotel.

name: Samaya Bura Beach Resort - Koh Samui
address: 171/4-9 Moo 4, Lamai, T Maret, Koh Samui 84310
description: The 3.5-star Samaya Bura Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Samui. Featuring a complete list of amenities, guests will find their stay at the property a comfortable one. Take advantage of the hotel's free Wi-Fi in all rooms, Wi-Fi in public areas, car park, room service, babysitting. Television LCD/plasma screen, slippers, towels, umbrella, separate living room can be found in selected guestrooms. Access to the hotel's hot tub, fitness center, outdoor pool, pool (kids), garden will further enhance your satisfying stay. Discover all Samui has to offer by making Samaya Bura Hotel your base.Agoda

name: Karma Resort
description: Facing the beachfront, Karma Resort - SHA Extra Plus offers 4-star accommodation in Bophut and features an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and garden. A few steps from Bophut Beach and 1.7 km from Mae Nam Beach, the property offers a shared lounge and a terrace. Guests can enjoy American and French dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a patio and a private bathroom with a bidet. Selected rooms here will provide you with a kitchen with a fridge, an oven and a microwave. At Karma Resort - SHA Extra Plus all rooms come with bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Full English/Irish or American options. Guests at the accommodation will be able to enjoy activities in and around Bophut, like hiking, snorkelling and cycling. W Koh Samui Beach is 2 km from Karma Resort - SHA Extra Plus, while Fisherman Village is 1.9 km away. The nearest airport is Samui International, 5 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Buri Rasa Village Samui
description: Located northwest of Koh Samui on the beachfront of Chaweng Beach, Buri Rasa Village offers an outdoor pool, spa and a hot tub. Rooms feature a private terrace and free Wi-Fi. Buri Rasa's spacious rooms are of a blend of traditional Thai decor with modern facilities. It provides a private bathroom, four-poster bed and cable TV with DVD player. Tea/coffee maker and a minibar are provided. Guests can enjoy a beach side dining at the Beach Club @ Buri Rasa. The lobby and beach bars serve drinks. For relaxation, guests can have traditional Thai herbal spa and therapy or soak up the sun at the outdoor pool or Chaweng Beach. Buri Rasa Village offers airport shuttle and car rental services. Parking is free. Buri Rasa Village is a 15-minute drive from Samui Airport.

name: The Ritz-Carlton Koh Samui
description: Surrounded by the crystal-clear waters of the Gulf of Thailand, our Koh Samui resort is located in a world-renowned island paradise that boasts turquoise waters and perfect beaches with a more laidback and authentic lifestyle. The Ritz-Carlton, Koh Samui - nestled within the private bay at the island’s northern tip and set in a 58 acres of a former coconut plantation – features a variety of suites and private pool villas that suit every guest's needs. It is perfect for wellbeing and leisure with its unique facilities, guest activities and experiences embracing the southern Thai culture and tradition within the resort. Highlights at our Koh Samui 5-star hotel include Muay Thai boxing classes, local-inspired treatment at Spa Village Koh Samui and a vibrant culinary journey at restaurants and bars as well as southern Thai cooking classes.Marriott

name: Samujana Villas
address: 63/154 Moo 5, Baan Plai Laem, Koh Samui 84320
description: Samujana Villas is located on Koh Samui, and offers 5-star facilities, including a private beach, an infinity pool and a butler service. It has a gym, as well as outdoor tennis courts, free Wi-Fi and a private cinema. The property provides a garden to unwind in, as well as free private parking on site. It offers body treatments and a sun deck, as well as fitness classes. All the villas at Samujana Villas include direct pool access, plus all the essentials for an enjoyable stay. They are air conditioned and offer a marble bathroom, a coffee maker and a private garden. A mini bar, a private terrace and a private balcony are also provided to guests. Samujana Villas has easy access to Choeng Mon Beach. Those wanting to explore the area can also visit Chaweng, located within an easy drive of the property.Revato

name: Villa Labaron
address: 30/204 Moo 4 T. Bo Phut, Koh Samui 84320
description: Located 1.8 km from Big Buddha, Villa Labaron boasts a beach front accommodation with a communal outdoor pool. This villa provides free WiFi access in all areas. Villa Labaron is 600 metres from Samui Crocodile Farm. A 3-minute drive will bring guests to Fisherman Village. Samui Airport is 1 km away. Featuring a terrace with an outdoor seating area, this air-conditioned villa offers a living area, a sofa set and a flat-screen TV. It also has a microwave, a fridge and a dining area. Shower facilities, free toiletries and towels are included in an en suite bathroom. At Villa Labaron, guests will find sun loungers and airport shuttle service. Bangrak Pier, from which guests can commute to Koh Pangan, is 1 km away.

name: Panalee Koh Samui Resort
address: 73/9 Moo 6 Tambon Maenam, Koh Samui Suratthani, Koh Samui 84330
description: Surrounded by nature, Panalee Koh Samui Resort - SHA Plus is located along peaceful Bang Po Beach in Koh Samui. Offering free Wi-Fi, it has an outdoor pool with a spa pool. Enjoying views of the ocean, mountain or pool, air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a satellite TV and DVD player. A personal safe and minibar are also included. Panalee Koh Samui Resort - SHA Plus is about 4.7 km from Nathon Pier and 14 km from Samui Airport. Free parking is available. The resort features open-air pavilions where guests can enjoy a traditional Thai massage. Island tours can also be arranged at the tour desk. A daily American breakfast is served at the resort's restaurant. In-room dining is available with room service.

name: Samui Bayview Resort & Spa
description: Standing on the green hills of Chaweng Noi, Samui Bayview Resort & Spa - SHA Plus offers guests breathtaking views of the sea and a peaceful location close to the busy city centre of Chaweng. The tranquil Samui Bayview Resort overlooks the most popular beach of Koh Samui. Among the facilities provided by Samui Bayview Resort & Spa - SHA Plus are an outdoor pool overlooking the sea and a fine spa offering treatments like outdoor massages. The Bayview Restaurant awaits you with delicious food paired with panoramic views of Chaweng Beach or Chaweng’s night lights. Every room is furnished with an Asian touch and comes with modern amenities. The suites offer a hot tub on the balcony while other rooms provide private balconies with beautiful sea views.

name: Samui Mermaid Beachfront
description: Samui Mermaid Resort is located in Baan Bang Rak (Big Buddha Bay) on the coast of north-east Koh Samui. Guests can choose to enjoy a stay at the seaside or the garden side. Featuring 3 swimming pools including an infinity edge pool, it also has free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour restaurant with outdoor seating. This tropical resort is a 10-minute journey from Samui Airport. Samui Mermaid Resort is a 15-minute drive from the Bophut fisherman village and nightlife at Chaweng. Lamai Beach is a 30-minute drive away. Featuring modern Thai décor, rooms are equipped with either a fan or air conditioning. All come with a cable TV, free bottled water and a private balcony. Attached bathrooms have hot-water showers. At the tour desk, guests can arrange to go elephant trekking, visit the crocodile farm or watch an exciting Muay Thai match. Water sports activities like diving and snorkelling can be enjoyed by the beach. Boasting beautiful sunset views, the beach-side Dolphin restaurant specialises in Thai and international dishes. Cocktails and a daily barbecue are offered at The Little Mermaid pool-side bar.

name: Samui Paradise Chaweng Beach Resort & Spa
description: Samui Paradise offers luxurious suites and villas with private terraces on a quiet strip of Koh Samui. The beachfront resort features an outdoor pool with 2 spa baths, a spa and 2 restaurants. Chaweng Centre is located just 500 metres from Samui Paradise Chaweng Beach Resort, SHA Plus. It is a 20-minute drive from Koh Samui Airport and 6 km from Lamai Beach. Rooms are charming with wooden flooring and furnishings. They enjoy great views of the sea or tropical gardens. All accommodation comes with free bottled water, cable TV and a minibar, while select rooms have a private outdoor spa bath. Guests can enjoy traditional Thai massages and body treatments at the resort’s spa or enjoy the sun on the many lounge chairs located throughout the property. For a quiet day, enjoy Wi-Fi in rooms. Fresh seafood, Thai and international cuisines are served at Paradise Restaurant, which boasts spectacular views of Chaweng Bay. Papa Sam’s Bar offers cocktails and chilled beer along the beach.

name: The Secret Pool Villas By The Library
description: This comfortable hotel in Chaweng offers complimentary Wi-Fi, as well as meeting rooms and a swimming pool. It also features babysitting/child services, luggage storage and a 24-hour reception. There are a range of amenities on offer to those staying at The Secret Pool Villas By The Library Koh Samui, including DVD/video rental, a library and limited hours room service. Guests can also enjoy private parking on site. The rooms are air conditioned and include a private garden, direct pool access and a private terrace. They all have a pillow menu, a mini bar and luxury linen. The Secret Pool Villas By The Library Koh Samui is located under a 10-minute car ride from Samui International Airport. Lamai Beach is just an easy drive from the hotel.Revato
